mapper.sql: person_id, work_no, person_name, person_sort_id, sex, birthday, native_place, id_card_no, education_id, graduate_school, marriage_status_id, address, constract, telphone, mobile, email, title_id, occupation_sort_id, join_date, serivice, level_date, input_code, input_code2, recipe_rights, last_update_operator, last_update_station, last_update_version, last_update_time, department_id
mapper.select: select operation_sort,sign_name,sign_data from emr_sign_list where operation_no = #{id}

SELECT ps_persons.sign_image, pe_register_items.compose_item_no, acc_users.user_name FROM pe_register_items, ps_persons, acc_users WHERE patient_no = #{id} AND pe_register_items.operator_id = acc_users.serial_no AND acc_users.login_name = ps_persons.work_no;
mapper.insert: insert into ps_persons (person_id, work_no, person_name, person_sort_id, sex, birthday, native_place, id_card_no, education_id, graduate_school, marriage_status_id, address, constract, telphone, mobile, email, title_id, occupation_sort_id, join_date, serivice, level_date, input_code, input_code2, recipe_rights, last_update_operator, last_update_station, last_update_version, last_update_time, department_id, sign_image, photo_image) values (#{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personSortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriageStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{occupationSortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serivice,jdbcType=BIT}, #{levelDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inputCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipeRights,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateStation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signImage,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{photoImage,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

update ps_persons
work_no = #{workNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person_name = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person_sort_id = #{personSortId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_no = #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
education_id = #{educationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
graduate_school = #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marriage_status_id = #{marriageStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
constract = #{constract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title_id = #{titleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
occupation_sort_id = #{occupationSortId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
join_date = #{joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
serivice = #{serivice,jdbcType=BIT},
level_date = #{levelDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
input_code = #{inputCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
input_code2 = #{inputCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recipe_rights = #{recipeRights,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_update_operator = #{lastUpdateOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_update_station = #{lastUpdateStation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_update_version = #{lastUpdateVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sign_image = #{signImage,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
photo_image = #{photoImage,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
